text: Earlier today, the House passed a resolution naming our Impeachment Managers in the upcoming Senate trial. Here is a quick look at their backgrounds. #DefendOurDemocracy

Imagine a country where the fossil fuel industry and the NRA don’t have a death grip on Congress.

We have to root out Washington corruption.

History will judge whether the Senate rose to the solemn occasion of the impeachment trial of President Trump.

I'm fully prepared to uphold my duty to protect the Constitution, follow the facts where they lead, and hold this president accountable. I hope my colleagues are too.
